channel.title: How do i change where shops are?
channel.description: Hi, i'm wondering how to change where shops are located... i looked in autospawn.cgf and shops.cgf but the co ordinates of them are different to where they actually are... how would i go about changing the actual place of them ??

item.title: How do i change where shops are?
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Get the NPC ID you wanna change, go into autospawn, than search for NPC ID than change it to your coords.
